mapper.select: SELECT a.*, b.payC payC, b.payN payN, b.payTypeAmt payTypeAmt FROM ( SELECT 'all' businessDate, cBranch_C shopC, cBranch_N shopN, SUM(nFoodAmt) foodAmt, COUNT(cBranch_C) billNum, CASE WHEN (COUNT(cBranch_C) = 0) THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(SUM(nFoodAmt) / COUNT(cBranch_C),2) END amtPerBill, SUM(iGuestNum) guestNum, CASE WHEN (SUM(iGuestNum) = 0) THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(SUM(nFoodAmt) / SUM(iGuestNum) ,2) END amtPerGuest, COUNT(DISTINCT cTable_N) tableNum, CASE WHEN (SUM(nFoodAmt) = 0 OR COUNT(DISTINCT cTable_N) = 0) THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(SUM(nFoodAmt) / COUNT(DISTINCT cTable_N) ,2) END amtPerTable, CASE WHEN (SUM(iGuestNum)=0 OR COUNT(DISTINCT cTable_N) = 0) THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(SUM(iGuestNum) / COUNT(DISTINCT cTable_N) ,2) END guestPerTable, SUM(nDisAmt) disAmt, SUM(nRoundAmt) roundAmt, SUM(nPresentAmt) presentAmt, SUM(nOughtAmt) oughtAmt, SUM(nPayAmt) payAmt FROM ${com}.d_t_food_bill WHERE DBUSINESS >= #{startDate} AND DBUSINESS <= #{endDate} GROUP BY cBranch_C, cBranch_N ORDER BY cBranch_C )a, ( SELECT b.cBranch_C shopC, b.CBRANCH_N ShopN, p.cPay_C payC, p.cPay_N payN, SUM(p.nPayAmt) payTypeAmt FROM ${com}.d_t_food_bill b, ${com}.d_t_bill_pay p WHERE b.cBill_C = p.cBill_C AND DBUSINESS >= #{startDate} AND DBUSINESS <= #{endDate} GROUP BY b.cBranch_C, b.CBRANCH_N, p.cPay_C, p.cPay_N ORDER BY b.cBranch_C, p.CPAY_C )b WHERE a.shopC = b.shopC

SELECT a.*, b.PAYC, b.PAYN, b.PAYTYPEAMT FROM ( SELECT date_format(DBUSINESS, '%Y-%m-%d') businessDate, cBranch_C shopC, cBranch_N shopN, SUM(nFoodAmt) foodAmt, COUNT(cBranch_C) billNum, CASE WHEN (COUNT(cBranch_C) = 0) THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(SUM(nFoodAmt) / COUNT(cBranch_C),2) END amtPerBill, SUM(iGuestNum) guestNum, CASE WHEN (SUM(iGuestNum) = 0) THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(SUM(nFoodAmt) / SUM(iGuestNum) ,2) END amtPerGuest, COUNT(DISTINCT cTable_N) tableNum, CASE WHEN (SUM(nFoodAmt) = 0 or COUNT(DISTINCT cTable_N) = 0) THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(SUM(nFoodAmt) / COUNT(DISTINCT cTable_N) ,2) END amtPerTable, CASE WHEN (SUM(iGuestNum)=0 or COUNT(DISTINCT cTable_N)=0) THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(SUM(iGuestNum) / COUNT(DISTINCT cTable_N) ,2) END guestPerTable, SUM(nDisAmt) disAmt, SUM(nRoundAmt) roundAmt, SUM(nPresentAmt) presentAmt, SUM(nOughtAmt) oughtAmt, SUM(nPayAmt) payAmt FROM ${com}.d_t_food_bill WHERE date_format(DBUSINESS, '%Y-%m-%d') IN ( SELECT date_format(DBUSINESS, '%Y-%m-%d') FROM ${com}.d_t_food_bill d WHERE DBUSINESS >= #{startDate} AND DBUSINESS <= #{endDate} GROUP BY date_format(DBUSINESS, '%Y-%m-%d') ) GROUP BY date_format(DBUSINESS, '%Y-%m-%d'), cBranch_C, cBranch_N ORDER BY date_format(DBUSINESS, '%Y-%m-%d'), cBranch_C )a, ( SELECT date_format(DBUSINESS, '%Y-%m-%d') businessDate, a.cBranch_C shopC, a.CBRANCH_N shopN, b.cPay_C payC, b.cPay_N payN, SUM(b.nPayAmt) payTypeAmt FROM ${com}.d_t_food_bill a, ${com}.d_t_bill_pay b WHERE a.cBill_C = b.cBill_C AND date_format(DBUSINESS, '%Y-%m-%d') IN ( SELECT date_format(DBUSINESS, '%Y-%m-%d') FROM ${com}.d_t_food_bill d WHERE DBUSINESS >= #{startDate} AND DBUSINESS <= #{endDate} GROUP BY date_format(DBUSINESS, '%Y-%m-%d') ) GROUP BY date_format(DBUSINESS, '%Y-%m-%d'), a.cBranch_C, a.CBRANCH_N, b.cPay_C, b.cPay_N ORDER BY date_format(DBUSINESS, '%Y-%m-%d'), a.cBranch_C )b WHERE a.businessDate = b.businessDate AND a.shopC = b.shopC ORDER BY a.BUSINESSDATE, a.SHOPC, b.PAYC
